author: mid-day online correspondent
title: 'Koffee With Karan': Saif Ali Khan admits to cheating on his partner! - Entertainment
text:
'Koffee With Karan': Saif Ali Khan admits to cheating on his partner! All pics/Star World India Twitter account 
Bollywood actors Saif Ali Khan and Kangana Ranaut will grace the couch in the next episode of 'Koffee With Karan' to promote their upcoming film 'Rangoon'.

Saif Ali Khan takes the 'coffee shot' 
In the teaser released online, Karan Johar can be seen hosting a round of 'coffee shots'. When KJo asked Saif Ali Khan if he has ever cheated on his partner, Saif drank his 'coffee shot'!

Kangana Ranaut on 'Koffee With Karan' 
Kangana Ranaut, being the firebrand that she is, confessed to being jealous of Aamir Khan's 'Dangal' success. She also admitted to being kissed by a girl. Not mincing any words, Kangana also accused Karan Johar of nepotism.
WATCH VIDEO: 
Up next, the Nawab & the Queen are coming to rule on the Koffee couch like never before! #KoffeeWithKaran pic.twitter.com/eB43uXLz4w 
â€” Star World (@StarWorldIndia) February 12, 2017
